1 kalastatic kalastatic

1.1 kalastatic.button Button

Displays a button on the page.

Parameters

  • title The text to display in the button.
  • href The link to point the button to.
  • active Whether or not the button will be the Active state.

Usage

{# Twig #}
{% include 'path/to/button.twig' with { title: 'Hello World!' } %}

{# Partials #}
{% partial('button', {title: 'Hello World!'}) %}
Example 
  


  
  
	<button class="pure-button pure-button-primary pure-button-active">Hello World!</button>
Source: partials/atoms/_button.scss, line 1

1.2 kalastatic.button-group Button Group

Displays a number of Buttons in an unordered list.

Example 
  <ul>
          <li>
          




	<button class="pure-button">The First Button</button>
      </li>
          <li>
          




	<button class="pure-button">The Second Button</button>
      </li>
      </ul>
Source: partials/molecules/_button-group.scss, line 1
